<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Order success">6f788f5c5fe202104577aaae78f48fd6</macroponent><name>confirmation_message_1_caption</name><preset/><required_translations>[ {
  "code" : null,
  "message" : "Reference Number : ",
  "comment" : ""
} ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    const label = helpers.translateSync("Reference Number : ")
    return `${label} ${api.state.successNumber}`;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-29 20:19:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>2f788f5cc8e202103613f7db444b8cd4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>confirmation_message_1_caption</sys_name><sys_package display_value="My Template App" source="x_1434439_my_tem_0">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="My Template App">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_2f788f5cc8e202103613f7db444b8cd4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-29 20:19:08</sys_updated_on><target/><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
